Title: Relates to mechanisms authorized sports bettors may utilize to fund their mobile sports wagering accounts
Summary: Provides that only automated clearing houses or electronic funds transfers from such authorized sports bettor's personal bank account, wire transfers from an authorized sports bettor's personal bank account, personal checks delivered to the operator, or in-person cash deposits at a casino or other approved location, may be used to fund mobile sports wagering accounts.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to mechanisms authorized sports bettors may utilize to fund their mobile sports wagering accounts
